roleset.name: greater in some way

example.name: arg1
example.text: We also have the advantage that we are from the same unit for life in most cases and so the cohesiveness is more and we know each other well .

example.name: both args
example.text: Your brain is more than a bag of chemicals

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1.

roleset.name: quasi-adverbial: "I'm more than (happy, etc) to do __"

role.descr: entity who is more than [arg2] to do [arg3]
subsequent action (if given its own taggable node)

example.name: all args
example.text: Certainly , if the need arises in the future , I am more than happy to help facilitate care .
example.arg: if the need arises in the future,
